Daniel Kamwa (amụrụ na 14 Eprel 1943) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ememe ihe nkiri si Nkongsamba, Cameroon. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara ihe nkiri na Paris, France, tupu o mepụta ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Boubou-cravate, na 1973. E tinyere ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 1981 Our Daughter n'ime 12th Moscow International Film Festival.
